column1: hador or hadron is a Noldorin word meaning "thrower of spears or darts". The word could also appear as a personal name
J.R.R. Tolkien continued to use the name Hador in the writings of the legendarium after the evolution from Noldorin to Sindarin
column3: p. 234 although it is unknown if he intended the Noldorin meaning to be retained.
